definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: Objective To study the acute effects of talc instillation intrapleurally.
sentences.chinese: 研究胸腔内注入滑石粉浆的急性反应。

sentences.english: The filler talc showed similar effect on photo- and thermal oxidation of PP.
sentences.chinese: 填料滑石粉对PP的热和光氧化有类似的作用。

sentences.english: Coconuts and powder-like sand help too.
sentences.chinese: 椰林和滑石粉般细腻的沙子也会为沙滩增色不少。

sentences.english: With a drop of alcohol, clear the pumice and begin rubbing over all of the scratches.
sentences.chinese: 用一滴酒精，清澄浮石粉后开始涂擦所有刮伤的地方。

sentences.english: The influence of different fineness to the film-forming properties of silicate coatings is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 考察了不同细度的滑石粉对硅酸盐涂料成膜性的影响。

sentences.english: Pulverised rock will climb as a dust cloud into the atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 石粉会像尘雾一样上升到大气中。

sentences.english: These are just a few methods that were designed to replace the pumicing procedure.
sentences.chinese: 这只是几种专门替代浮石粉的方法。

sentences.english: The talcum powder took the volume auxiliaries , reduced the sealant production cost.
sentences.chinese: 滑石粉作为体积填充剂，降低了密封胶的生产成本。

sentences.english: She took a quick breath, inhaling the scent of alcohol and glove talc.
sentences.chinese: 她轻轻呼吸了一下，空气中满是酒精和滑石粉的味道。

sentences.english: Try walking in spilt talcum powder
sentences.chinese: 试试在滑石粉上面走几步。

sentences.english: Use a metal mold and a release agent such as talcum powder.
sentences.chinese: 需要使用金属模具和脱模剂例如滑石粉末。

sentences.english: Conclusion The intrapleural administration of talcum powder is definitely effective in the treatment of post operative.
sentences.chinese: 结论胸腔内注射滑石粉治疗乳糜胸疗效肯定。

sentences.english: Add only a little alcohol and pumice as you work.
sentences.chinese: 每次只要加很少的酒精和浮石粉。

sentences.english: Composite particle of talc powder with uniform size distribution and better activation is fabricated by stirred mill based on the principle of mechanochemistry.
sentences.chinese: 依据机械化学效应，用搅拌磨制备滑石粉复合粒子。

definition: crushed or broken rock, stone etc
